title-group.article-title: A METHOD OF FINDING A STRICTLY FEASIBLE SOLUTION FOR LINEAR CONSTRAINTS

abstract.p: This paper presents a method of finding a strictly feasible solution for linear constraints. We prove, under certain assumptions, that the method is convergent in a finite number of iterations, and give the sufficient and necessary conditions for the infeasibllity of the problem. Actually, it can be considered as a constructive proof for the Farkas lemma.
